name: Script template (PV)
snippet:
<fmxmlsnippet type="FMObjectList">
	<Step enable="True" id="89" name="# (comment)"></Step>
	<Step enable="True" id="89" name="# (comment)">
		<Text>DATE</Text>
	</Step>
	<Step enable="True" id="89" name="# (comment)">
		<Text>AUTHOR</Text>
	</Step>
	<Step enable="True" id="89" name="# (comment)"></Step>
	<Step enable="True" id="89" name="# (comment)">
		<Text>Param sample/Description</Text>
	</Step>
	<Step enable="True" id="89" name="# (comment)">
		<Text>JSONSetElement ( "";[ "Param1" ; value ; JSONString ] // comment;[ "Param2" ; value ; JSONString ] // comment;[ "Param3" ; value ; JSONString ] // comment)</Text>
	</Step>
	<Step enable="True" id="89" name="# (comment)"></Step>
	<Step enable="True" id="141" name="Set Variable">
		<Value>
			<Calculation><![CDATA[JSONCreateVarsFromKeys ( Get ( ScriptParameter )  ; "")]]></Calculation>
		</Value>
		<Repetition>
			<Calculation><![CDATA[1]]></Calculation>
		</Repetition>
		<Name>$null</Name>
	</Step>
	<Step enable="True" id="89" name="# (comment)"></Step>
	<Step enable="True" id="89" name="# (comment)"></Step>
	<Step enable="True" id="89" name="# (comment)"></Step>
	<Step enable="True" id="89" name="# (comment)">
		<Text>SCRIPT BODY</Text>
	</Step>
	<Step enable="True" id="89" name="# (comment)"></Step>
	<Step enable="True" id="89" name="# (comment)"></Step>
	<Step enable="True" id="89" name="# (comment)"></Step>
	<Step enable="True" id="141" name="Set Variable">
		<Repetition>
			<Calculation><![CDATA[1]]></Calculation>
		</Repetition>
		<Name>$result</Name>
	</Step>
	<Step enable="True" id="103" name="Exit Script">
		<Calculation><![CDATA[$result]]></Calculation>
	</Step>
	<Step enable="True" id="89" name="# (comment)"></Step>
</fmxmlsnippet>
description: A minimalist script with JSON params
